name: La Loi de la Lance (Demo)
description:
La Loi de la Lance is a canceled project I made with Yo Riso.

It was planned to be a Genesis/Megadrive homebrew, a heroic/mythic fantasy platformer with metroidvania features.

You can have a small glimpse of what could have been with this very short demo.

On the side you'll find some unused graphic assets Yo Riso made for the game.
